item.title: LSP for Swift
item.description: What is Language Server Protocol(LSP)? Language Server Protocol defines standardized protocol with which both a text editor or IDE(client) and a language(server) communicate. The protocol is based on JSONRPC. A client(text editor) can implement Go to definition Error and warnings Auto completion … https://microsoft.github.io/language-server-protocol/overviews/lsp/overview/ Solves m-times-n complexity problems What is Sourcekit-LSP? Apple’s LSP implementation on top of sourcekitd and clangd sourcekitd is a framework that provide IDE features clangd for c-family languages (C/C++/ObjC) language server supports only Swift Package Manager project As of Xcode 11.
